channel.title: Getting Started - Help Please
channel.description:
ok, i have finished making my server - saradomin.no-ip.biz but i dont know how to make myself like.. admin.. i open up no-id and i open up my soarce, SvenScap3pk, and then i open up moparscape, and sign in, without filling in the IP adress form. then it signs me in, but im not admin, and i dont think the server is actually up. so, can anyone help me get me started?
Aim - Willehxxmmk
If anyone could help, it would be really great :D
-Will

item.title: Getting Started - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

ok, ill try it…
but last time i think it didnt work…
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 09:01:05 PM[/size][hr]ok, i have it downloaded, and i changed the things you told me to, but it still doesnt work.
when i keep the coding that was already on svenscap3pk i can run the server, but i cant compile it.
on that thing i cant do either, and theres not any compile data.
when i open up compile, it comes up blank.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 09:03:58 PM[/size][hr]waiittt, do you think its becuase i have a “compile.bat” and a “serverfile.bat” but no “runserver.bat”?
i am putting the stuff you told me to put in “runserver.bat” in serverfile.bat, i hope thats right o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Started - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Go here and download JDK 6u1. Then follow my tutorial I made for it.

Step 1:
[i]Ok, first we have to set the variables. Click on your Start Menu, then Control Panel, then System, then Advances, And finally Environmental Variables.

So, in short:
Start Menu – Control Panel – System – Advanced – Environmental Variables.[/i]

Step 2:
[i]Ok, now look for the variable named “path” in the list that is shown. Rename it “PATH” and then replace its variable value with this:[i]

c:\Windows\System32\;”C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Step 3:
Now make a new variable and name it “classpath.” Add this for its value:

C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Ok, now that you have your variables set, we need to edit the runserver.bat and compile.bat.

Step 4:
[i]Ok, right-click on your compile.bat and click edit. Now replace everything in it with this:[i]

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Step 5:
[i]Ok, now right-click on you runserver.bat and click edit. Now replace everything in it with this:[i]

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

You are finished

This looks like Mod Taharok’s Tutorial, but it is edited to work with JDK 6u1.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Started - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

when i try to compile i get:
“You do not have JDK 5.0 update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to mod taharok’s tutorial on the Moparscape tuturoials section for the direct link to download the newst JDK Update.
Pres any key to continue…”
even tho i have downloaded like, every java thing ive found.
can somone give me a direct link to what i need to download?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Started - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Go under the file characters.

Look for you name.

Clikc on it.

go un the thing that says [character]

look for player rights and change it to 3 for owner, 2 for admins, and 1 for mod.

then save but make sure you arent logged on

Read full topic
